about me

I’m a developer who welcomes the challenge of taking a complex problem and then rewrite it into a simple and intuitive code. Coding Problems Requires Kodex Solutions.

Then implementing those same codes, making sure the interface fulfills its function by working as it should be and smoothly for the user.

At the present, working on learning a broad range of cross-industry skills and technologies such as programming, algorithms, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Python, Flask, SQLite. And as well building web application on my free time and contributing to open source.

When I’m not coding, you’ll find me with a cup of coffee and either reading a good story or traveling abroad.
